      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MessagingChannelRMI
      The class must be used this way: The initialization is performed by the serverRMI (1) The utilizer class will get the client reference, and call its remote methods to ask questions, (2) The the utilizer will call getAnswer(), which will block the execution flow until the server has set the answer.
